definition: to ally/to unite/to join/(poetry) antithetical couplet
can/to be possible/to be able to/will/to be likely to/to be sure to/to assemble/to meet/to gather/to see/union/group/association/CL:個|个[ge4]/a moment (Taiwan pr. for this sense is [hui3])

sentences.english: So apparently there's this area where all like the sororities are
sentences.chinese: 所以这个区域是很多女大学生联谊会聚集的地方。

sentences.english: and they talk to each sorority like, they make a little round-robin kind of thing.
sentences.chinese: 跟每个联谊会谈话，有一点循环赛的感觉。

sentences.english: In the meantime she takes up other social positions like the vice president of Liaoning Overseas Friends Sodality .
sentences.chinese: 同时出任辽宁省海外联谊会副会长等多项社会职务。

sentences.english: How did you get in your sorority?
sentences.chinese: 你是怎么进入你的联谊会的？

sentences.english: If it's a conference or networking event, inquire as to what line of work they're in.
sentences.chinese: 你在协商会或社交联谊会，问问是做工作的。

sentences.english: Today, I was on the bus going to forming for my sorority.
sentences.chinese: 这日，我坐在公车上去联谊会。

sentences.english: Join a club, or a fraternity or sorority, or the student council.
sentences.chinese: 加入一个社团或者联谊会，又或者是学生会。

sentences.english: Chairman of Chinese and Swedish Culture Association in Helsingborg , Sweden.
sentences.chinese: 赫尔辛堡市中国瑞典文化联谊会主席。

sentences.english: Her escapades were a subject of merriment in the sorority house.
sentences.chinese: 在女生联谊会中，她的恶作剧总是欢乐的根源。

sentences.english: There are a lot of sororities that don't have housing.
sentences.chinese: 但有很多女生联谊会是没有场所的。

sentences.english: And then the girls going through recruitment get to choose which sorority they want to be in.
sentences.chinese: 然后参加招新的女生选择她们想去的联谊会。

sentences.english: Mary joined a sorority when she was at college.
sentences.chinese: 玛莉在大学的时候加入了女学生联谊会。

sentences.english: I missed out on all those things like joining a sorority.
sentences.chinese: 我已经错过了所有的类似加入女生联谊会这样的事情。

sentences.english: Yeah. I'm in my sorority. And I'm also in the orchestra.
sentences.chinese: 有，我参加了女大学生联谊会，还参加了管弦乐团。

sentences.english: General Meetings have the ultimate authority and power within CSSA.
sentences.chinese: 联谊会的最高权力机构是全体会员大会。

sentences.english: The Kowloon Cheung Sha Wan Wholesale Vegetable Market (Importers) Recreation Club.
sentences.chinese: 九龙长沙湾蔬菜批发市场入口货商联谊会。

definition: member of a board of directors
social gathering at which those attending take it in turns to perform for the whole group (music, dancing or comedy etc)
abbr. for 中國文學藝術界聯合會|中国文学艺术界联合会, China Federation of Literary and Art Circles (CFLAC)
